edu.cuny.ai.learning
Class WidrowHoffLearnerWithMomentum

java.lang.Object
  edu.cuny.ai.learning.AbstractLearner
      edu.cuny.ai.learning.WidrowHoffLearner
          edu.cuny.ai.learning.WidrowHoffLearnerWithMomentum
All Implemented Interfaces:
ContinuousLearner, Learner, MimicryLearner, Parameterizable, Prototypeable, Resetable, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable
public class WidrowHoffLearnerWithMomentum
extends WidrowHoffLearner

An extension of WidrowHoffLearner that supports the discounted effect of cumulative training signal, i.e. momentum.

Parameters

base.momentum
double [0, 1] (0.5 by default)		 (discount rate of cumulative training signal)

Version:
$Revision: 1.11 $
Author:
Steve Phelps
See Also:
